creator: richardw@geoquip-rnd.demon.co.uk
text:
Image scaling didn't work in the Java2d based renderers, as the putImage
function was referring to the wrong height/width.

Created attachment 16011
Trivial patch for Java2DRenderer to fix image scaling.
creator: richardw@geoquip-rnd.demon.co.uk

text:
Applied. Thanks!

While looking at your patch I realized there were a couple of other problems 
concerning images in the Java2DRenderer:
- JPEG painting doesn't always work (It's currently handled differently from 
the other formats)
- Clipping is not implemented
creator: jeremias@apache.org
gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
